name: Capital Air (Pty) Ltd
about: At Capital Air (Pty) Ltd, we are dedicated to providing comprehensive and affordable flight training through our Capital Air Academy. Located at Rand Airport in South Africa, our academy offers thousands of hours of actual flight-time experience and hands-on instruction. With the largest privately-owned helicopter fleet in the country, we cater to a wide range of aviation needs, including air charters, security services, and maintenance. Our experienced instructors and state-of-the-art facilities ensure that students receive top-notch training, preparing them for successful careers in aviation. Whether you aspire to be an airline pilot, flight instructor, or corporate pilot, Capital Air Academy is your gateway to discovering new horizons in the skies.
